name: Eggerland: Souzou he no Tabidachi
summary:
Eggerland: Souzou he no Tabidachi is a part of the Eggerland series. The storyline isn't really known since there is no storyline in the game. All you see is Lolo, the main character walk into a castle, and the doors shut behind him. There are 50 rounds in the game, which is less than the other Eggerland Famicom games. The game is unique out of all the other Eggerland titles for Famicom by allowing the player to create their own levels.

Like the other Eggerland games, the objective of each stage is simple; collect all the heart frames and then collect the orb inside the treasure box to proceed to the next level. It won't be easy though; King Egger has sent forth his enemies to take care of you. Lolo must use certain tactics to get by, such as trapping the enemies or knocking them off the screen temporarily.

name: Egg Finder
summary: Find the eggs.

name: Egg Venture
summary: One of the more "kid-friendly" animated gun-shooting games. Players use an optical gun to shoot at the "bad eggs" while avoiding shooting the "good guy eggs". Players advance stage by stage to different levels by shooting a certain number of targets.

name: Eggconsole Dinosaur PC-8801mkIISR
summary: A hardcore story-driven, command-based RPG. Become the Ash and embark on an adventure through the world of Dinosaur alongside your traveling companions.

name: Eggconsole Mado Monogatari 1-2-3 MSX2
summary: A comical 3D RPG featuring a unique worldview and system. Join Arle Nadja, a girl aspiring to become a sorceress, as she adventures through three scenarios!

name: Eggconsole Kiss of Murder PC-8801
summary: The third entry in the detective J.B. Harold series is, surprisingly, a parallel story to “Manhattan Requiem”! Use deduction commands to solve the case.

name: Eggconsole Zanac EX MSX2
summary: The Zanac battle, which was supposed to have ended, was not over. To suppress the reactivated organic intelligence, Zanac takes flight once again!

name: Egg Boy
summary: " EGG BOY " is a parkour fighting game based on cute cartoon style, including both single and multiplayer modes. Dozens of party levels, hundreds of different types of EGG BOYs to choose from, rich and interesting activity modes to participate in.

name: Egg
summary: why not be an egg

name: Egg Game
summary: Roll, dodge, and hatch in this relaxing adventure. Navigate a bustling kitchen as a fragile egg, avoiding obstacles, collecting golden yolks, and hatching quirky birds in a charming, casual experience.

name: Ego
summary: A Smoke based 3D Beat’em all. Fight thousands of robots at a time through open-ended levels in this Arcade style Smoking Wizard game ! Dash, Jump, Climb, ignite your smoke and obliterate every bots in your way!

name: Ego
summary: In Ego, you travel through your mental palace to solve puzzles and unlock long-forgotten memories.

name: Egg Meister
summary:
Meet Egg Meister — the scientifically accurate, delightfully quirky egg timer designed exclusively for your Playdate! Inspired by weekend breakfasts and the joy of perfectly boiled eggs. Or should we say: eggcelent!

Egg Meister guides you through simple setup screens to ensure every egg is cooked just the way you like it. Need some entertainment while you wait? Pull the crank to launch a playful mini-game where you catch eggs in a sizzling pan, racking up points as the difficulty ramps up—without missing the countdown!

Complete with custom chill-out sounds and retro-style graphics, Egg Meister blends utility, nostalgia, and fun into one charming package. And for the true eggsperts, you can fine-tune your eggperience by adjusting egg mass, temperature, and altitude settings.

name: EGA Trek
summary:
EGATrek puts you in command of a starship in a battle to save the galaxy. A large invasion fleet has arrived and you alone are responsible for fighting off the invaders in your quadrant. You'll be kept busy figuring out battle strategy as you go from encounter to encounter.

In addition, you'll need to find star bases to resupply your ship. You may be called on to make rescues of other ships or planets. And you must do it all as quickly as possible without running out of fuel or getting your ship destroyed.

name: Egress
summary: Egress is a role-playing battle royale with an intense hardcore Souls-like combat system. Choose your hero with unique abilities and become the last survivor.

name: Eggconsole Super Laydock Mission Striker MSX
summary: A renowned shooting game that made its mark in the history of MSX. Fight through using not only your shots, but also by skillfully employing option weapons!

name: Eggconsole Super Tritorn MSX2
summary: The brave warrior Tritorn rises to bring peace back to the Isle of Luwanda. A celebrated Action RPG classic from the early era of PC gaming!

name: Egg Hunt VR
summary: Experience an Easter Egg Hunt in VR!

name: Eggconsole Tritorn MSX
summary: In this masterpiece action RPG, the brave warrior Triton rises to restore peace to Luwanda Island. The MSX version features different strategies!

name: Eggsplosion
summary: Eggsplosion is a free local multiplayer twin-stick arena brawler with fighting chickens, bouncing eggs, tons of power-ups and heaps of fun. Eggcellent for a fun evening with your friends!

name: Ego League
summary: A competitive, skill-based football game where you control a single player. Master precise movement, dribbling, and shooting mechanics, and compete in fast-paced, online multiplayer team matches. Build your ego by equipping powerful, customizable abilities that define your unique playstyle.

name: Ego Protocol: Remastered
summary:
Ego Protocol: Remastered is a mix of classic platformer and logical game with retro, handmade graphics! Be smart and quick, solve puzzles and avoid traps! Guide your robot safely!

INNOVATIVE! ADDICTIVE! LOGICAL & RETRO!

name: Eggconsole Riglas PC-8801
summary: Seeking the secret of Beljuna, May Osborn set out from the village. What he saw, guided by the crystal, was..

name: Egglia Rebirth
summary: A new Legend begins. A story of hello-s and goodbye-s, bursting from a magical egg. Win simple, intuitive dice-roll battles to find more eggs and make Egglia thrive, or enjoy decorating your home and mingling with the unique characters that inhabit your town. Create your personal home-away-from-home in the soft, colorful world of Egglia.

name: Egypt City Builder
summary: Build, expand and shape a glorious ancient empire.

name: Egg Surprise: No more clicks!
summary: With this DLC, you will no longer have to click manually. The No More Clicks DLC adds an auto-click function to the game even when minimized, allowing you to collect with ease.

name: Ego in a Coma
summary:
Ego In A Coma is 2D Action Sword Fighting Game.
Player can use several weapon to beat enemies.
This game has 5 stages and multi endings.

Each stage has different concept like Cyberpunk, Dark Fantasy, Digital World, and Psychedelic World.

name: Eggconsole Daidassou PC-8801
summary: Infiltrate the prisoner-of-war camp!Use guns, grenades, and more to blast through the enemy and complete a great escape with your five comrades!

name: Egypt II: The Heliopolis Prophecy
summary: The game is set in 1360 BC and Heliopolis, the City of the Sun, has been struck by a plague. The player's father has also been infected. In a first person perspective, the player must find a cure and save your father and the rest of Heliopolis.

name: Ego's Spark
summary: Is this a nascent ego—or just a nasty bug? Crash headfirst into cuddles, comfort, and maybe even love in this short visual novel about robots and the human heart.

name: Egg Chicken Farm
summary: This is a casual idle simulation game. Nurturing chicks and collecting different chicken species. You will start with an egg, Watch the chicks grow. Use the breeding house to produce new eggs. Earn coins to upgrade facilities, gradually expand your farm, and unlock more content.

name: Egret II Mini: Arcade Memories Vol. I
summary:
A compilation of ten arcade games for Taito's 'Egret II Mini' home arcade machine. This features:
Great Swordsman
Ohgon no Siro
Slap Fight
Daisenpu
PuLiRuLa
Grid Seeker
Riding Fight
Light Bringer
Gekirindan
Cleopatra Fortune

name: Egg Knight
summary:
Save the Egg Knight world by defeating the Dark Army! 
Assemble your troops by collecting Knights that hatch from eggs! What Knight will you get? 
A bold Miner Knight? A humble Farmer Knight? Or a mysterious Witch Knight? Or someone else? 
Each Egg Knight is born with unique talent, from a dragon-born Farmer Knight to a ninja Farmer Knight! 
Go collect all the Egg Knights!

name: Egglia: Legend of the Redcap
summary:
"Egglia: Legend of the Redcap is a brand new RPG adventure made by an all-star team.

Follow the story of a gentle elf named Chabo, who mysteriously falls from the sky and arrives on the continent of Egglia. Uncover the mystery of Chabo and Egglia as you explore and uncover new areas of the world sealed away within eggs, and develop the world of Egglia through building houses, summoning spirits, warding off monsters and forming alliances with other races."

name: Eggggg
summary:
Egggg is a classic platformer for mobile units, but with a twist: You can vomit. The main character is a boy allergic towards eggs, and you must get through a lot of challenging levels without getting into contact with eggs, chickens or mean auntie Doris.

All the games mechanics is based on the character throwing up, and the vomit has unique abilities based on what you eat. For example, you can make the ground icy in order to move faster, sticky in order to climb walls, hot in order to spit flames, make puddles you can swim over, and a lot more.

The game is a tie-in with the feature film under production by Maipo Film, and both the movie and the game based on the book Eggg by Stein Erik Lunde, will launch fall 2016.

name: Eggrolls Shoot
summary: Eggrolls Shoot is a retro inspired arcade shoot ‘em up game. Our game is all about the adventure of saving the animal world.

name: Eggconsole Hydlide II MSX
summary: Become the chosen one and seal the evil consciousness targeting Fairyland! Utilize magic to conquer a field map six times larger than the previous game!

name: Egg Monster Hero
summary: a role playing game spin-off of the Hanjuku Hero. Between Egg Monster invasions, Lord Almamoon has begun slacking off. In order to counteract this, his minister Sebastian sends him to an island to train, which kicks off the story. Egg Monster Hero was released on the Nintendo DS in Japan on March 24, 2005, and was the first game Square Enix published for that console. Players primarily interact using the stylus to drag Egg Monsters towards the enemy and perform special attacks. A mobile phone version of the game became available in Japan on June 6. The game was intended for a North American release but ultimately canceled due to poor reception by focus groups. It was the 141st best-selling game of 2005 in Japan, selling 92,096 copies.

name: Eggness
summary: Eggnes is on a mission to rescue his wife from the evil Crack Pot, who wishes to cook her. Eggness is a difficult old-school 2D action game. It features hand drawn animations and boss battles. Now in early access, Episode 1 features 1 boss battle, 1 platform section and 1 story mission.

name: Eggconsole Manhattan Requiem: Angels Flying In The Dark PC-8801
summary: A woman meets a mysterious death in Manhattan. Detective J.B. Harold begins his investigation with the help of his former partner, Jad Gregory.

name: Eggman
summary: FEED EGGS. Drag eggs from your basket and feed them to Eggman. Keep feeding him until… well, no one's gotten there before. Could it be you?

name: Eggconsole Guardic MSX
summary: A shooting game from COMPILE that requires mapping. Explore the maze and destroy the enemy mothership at the deepest level!

name: Eggcelerate! to the Tropics
summary: Race through rainforests and beaches with motorcycles to navigate the winding paths while attempting to carry an egg! Time-trial your way to the top of the leaderboards, find and collect hidden treasures and artifacts, and do your best not to break an egg!

name: Eggconsole Revival Xanadu II PC-9801
summary: A remake of the classic action RPG “Xanadu” has arrived—designed for ultra-heavy users, even seasoned Xanadu experts are sure to struggle!

name: Egg, Inc.
summary: Egg, Inc. is a mobile idle simulation game where players build and manage a futuristic egg farm. The goal is to hatch chickens, expand housing, upgrade vehicles, and research technologies to maximize egg production. As players progress, they unlock increasingly valuable egg types tied to scientific and economic breakthroughs. The game combines incremental mechanics with light management strategy, featuring contracts, missions, and prestige resets that encourage long‑term progression.

name: Eggplant
summary: Eggplant is a clicker game in which you click an Eggplant. Gain Eggplants by clicking the Eggplant. Every 3 hours, you get a random Eggplant to add to your collection. Trade with others and grow your collection!

name: Eggconsole Arctic PC-8801mkIISR
summary: Guide the colorful, roaming planets to the goal. A new type of puzzle game where you skillfully switch points on the rails for fun.

name: Eggconsole Hydlide PC-8801
summary:
Operate the hero Jim and defeat the demon Varalys, the strongest in mythology! A classic action RPG representing the 1980s. An active role-playing game released by T&E SOFT in 1984.

The player takes on the role of Jim, a brave young man, and his objective is to restore peace to Fairyland by searching for the lost gem and defeating the demon Varalys. Action is the key to this game. Players switch between attack and defense modes as they fight monsters by slamming Jim into them.

This game is a pioneer of the Japanese PC fantasy RPGs of the 1980's. It is a monster title that reigned at the top of the popularity rankings in PC game magazines for a long time, with its diverse and beautifully composed fields, including plains, castles, churches, and labyrinths.

name: Eggggg: The Platform Puker
summary: Eggggg is a ridiculous two-button platform game about vomit. It's an action packed and crazy experience. Gilbert has an extreme allergy to eggs. Eating them will literally make him vomit like a fountain. He escapes from his mean aunt Doris in order to get to a birthday party, and needs to use his vomiting superpower to survive a world of angry cyborg chickens... of course.

name: Egg Is Broken. Heart Is Too.
summary: You are a chicken. Break into a restaurant kitchen and rescue your precious baby egg from the clutches of evil, hungry humans. You can do it. You have the power of motherly love.

name: Eggconsole Carbuncle Pi MSX2
summary: An action puzzle game starring Carbuncle. Use left and right movement and jumping to collect the gems on the map!

name: Eggs Catcher VR
summary: Eggs Catcher VR is a modern interpretation of the good classics. Leading plot outline will remain the same - the main goal of a player is to catch as many eggs as possible using a special basket and receive points for it.

name: Eggconsole Brandish Renewal PC-9801
summary: Play as the bounty target Ares, battle various enemies, overcome numerous traps, and escape from the underground labyrinth!

name: Eggconsole Yuureikun MSX2
summary: Suddenly turned into a ghost and in a total panic! Set off on an adventure with Ocho-kodama as your companion to meet the King of Hell, Enma!

name: Eggwolf: Office Eggscape
summary: The fiscal earnings report is due tomorrow, and it's already late. Get the job done, complete tasks from your coworkers, and avoid the killer Eggwolf. Estimated 20-30 minutes of playtime.

name: Eggconsole Ys PC-8801mkIISR
summary:
This is an action RPG released by Nihon Falcom in 1987. The landmark first game of an ongoing popular title. Master the 'half-character shift' and embark on an adventure in the land of Esteria!

Players take on the role of Adol Christin, a red-haired adventurer, as he embarks on a journey to seek the six Books of Ys.

At the time of its release, the PC gaming industry was saturated with challenging RPGs. However, Nihon Falcom took a different approach with this game, releasing it with the concept of ""Now, it's the era to bring kindness in RPGs,"" aiming to create an RPG that everyone could enjoy.

The game features clever level-up settings that eliminate the hassle of grinding for experience points, the removal of unreasonable traps, and agile characters that move smoothly. With numerous thoughtful design choices, the game can be enjoyed comfortably, and it is not an exaggeration to say that it is filled with ""kindness,"" as the tagline suggests.

name: Eggy Car
summary: Eggy Car is a fun and challenging physics-based driving game where your goal is to transport a fragile egg across bumpy roads without breaking it. Unlike traditional racing games that focus on speed, Eggy Car requires precision and control to keep the egg from falling. Navigate through hills, gaps, and obstacles, collect coins to unlock better cars, and use power-ups like the diamond freeze to help you travel farther. Every run is a test of balance and patience, making it an addictive game for players of all skill levels. How far can you go without cracking the egg?

name: Egypt: Old Kingdom
summary: Egypt: Old Kingdom is a turn-based strategy, built on the history of the I-VIII dynasties of Ancient Egypt. Take on the role of tjati - the royal viziers, governing the state on behalf of the great pharaohs. Manage resources, assign workers, found new districts, build temples and palaces and discover the amazing history of Ancient Egypt. Become a witness on more than a hundred historical events that occurred from 3150 to 2150 BC. Develop early state on the banks of the Nile to the Greatest Civilization, which created the Wonder of the Ancient World, survived to this day.

name: Eggconsole Aramo MSX
summary: Escape from a planet of a perished ultra-advanced civilization. A survival action RPG unfolds on a quarter-view planet!

name: Eggconsole Wanderers From Ys MSX2
summary: The third installment of "Ys" with even more action-packed elements! Two years after the Ys adventure. Save Dogi's hometown, Felghana, from the clutches of evil!

name: Eggconsole Lizard PC-8801
summary: Obtain the Book of Truth from the legendary Lizard Tower! This title is highly acclaimed as one of the finest Japanese-made RPGs from the dawn of PC gaming.

name: Eggconsole Mad Rider MSX2
summary: Dash through a 200 km/h world where your rivals await! The exciting car racing game is here!

name: Eggconsole Rune Worth 2 PC-9801
summary: Set in a world where the power of the gods, Sail, is waning, you will embark on an adventure as Leen Kashua.

name: Eggconsole Revival Xanadu Easy Ver PC-9801
summary: Search for the legendary sword “Dragon Slayer” and defeat the dragon! Now with enhanced graphics and BGM compared to the original version.

name: Eggerland: Meikyuu no Fukkatsu
summary: Eggerland: Meikyuu no Fukkatsu is a puzzle video game developed by HAL Laboratory for the Family Computer. It was released in 1988 in Japan as the fourth game in the Eggerland series following Eggerland Mystery, and is the third in the series not counting the port of Eggerland 2 made for the Famicom Disk System. The game contains roughly 162 stages (or maps), which are arranged on an 8-by-16 grid (with some stages hidden).

name: Egypt 1156 B.C.: Tomb of the Pharaoh
summary: Prepare yourself for an adventure in a 3D world, in a time and place full of intrigue and mystery. You are Ramose, an ordinary man in extraordinary circumstances. Your father has been accused of stealing treasures from a royal tomb. Unless you can show the Pharaoh proof of innocence, your father will be executed and his name erased from history. Live everyday life in Egypt over 3000 years ago, as you experience the splendor, the passion and the mystery of a very special moment in time. Go now...into the tomb of the Pharaoh!

name: Eggs: All Guns Broken
summary: Warning: This game starts 6 minutes long but can go on forever. Eggs is a slow-paced casual rail shooter that places you in a desert loop to face endless variations of baddies. Fly as far as you can!

name: Eggconsole Ys II MSX2
summary: A grand story unfolds in the ancient kingdom of Ys. The raging development that unravels the many settings inherited from the previous title is a must-see!

name: Eggplant
summary: Eggplant is a simple clicker game where you can relax, click on eggplants, and receive plenty of amazing rewards. Receive Eggplant drops and grow your collection!

name: Eggstraordinary Goose Chase
summary: Not your everyday goose chase—this time, the goose is on the hunt! Sprint through vibrant levels, dodge obstacles, collect berries, stomp enemies, and take bold risks! Keep running, push your limits, and reclaim what’s yours!

name: Egglings
summary: Hatch all kind of eggs collecting so called egglings. Sell, release or shelter them to unlock and progress in the game.

name: Egghead Gumpty
summary: Explore an infinite procedurally-generated abandoned juvie as you try to survive a monstrous egg with legs named Egghead Gumpty that’s hiding in the building. He can watch you from anywhere, so catch him stalking you before it’s too late in this unique horror experience.

name: Eggerland Mystery
summary:
You can play 100 regular stages, 10 bonus stages, and 5 special stages.
Get the dia-framer by manipulating the hero Roro, and clear each stage by dodging the attacks of monsters, such as MEDUSA, SKULL, ARMMA, GOLL, and SNAKEY.
This game is an extreme challenge.
* With Egger land Mystery, you can enjoy two different configurations;
Type A - puzzle game and
Type B - puzzle and adventure game.
* There is a construction function which makes it possible for you to construct your own special screen.

name: Eggconsole Crimson PC-8801mkIISR
summary: Carry on your late father's will and defeat the ferocious Crimson! XTAL SOFT presents a fully-fledged command-based RPG!

name: Eggconsole Silpheed PC-8801mkIISR
summary:
The best 3D shooter game of the 80's. Drive the Silpheed fighter jet and crush the ambitions of the Xacalite who have sacked Gloire.

"SILPHEED" is a vertical scrolling 3D shooter game released by Gamearts in 1986.
The player boards the air fighter SA-08 Silpheed and sets out to crush the insurgency.

The game consists of a total of 20 areas, including outer space, inside the base, and above the planet, and players advance while destroying enemies who fly in one after another. Silpheed can be powered up by collecting items placed in each area, and weapons are added according to the score.

At the end of each area, players will be confronted by large enemies with unique attack methods, such as attacking with ring lasers or reflecting our lasers.

name: Eggconsole Dragon Slayer: The Legend of Heroes II PC-8801mkIISR
summary: An RPG set in a world 20 years after the previous installment. Take on the role of Prince Atlas and confront a new darkness threatening the peace of Eselhasa.

name: Egnima
summary: Egnima is a solo puzzle game where you explore diverse biomes and their unique challenges.

name: Eggy
summary:
EGGY is an action game that won the Excellence Award at Bothtec's first programming contest and was inspired by Choplifter. In this game players take the role of Ena, a robot which has to collect goods that are dropped from the sky with parachutes.

The robot has a limited fuel supply that decreases with time and every time the robot takes damage from the enemies. The fuel supply can be replenished by saving humans that were transformed into killer cyborgs.

The robot can only shoot diagonally after jumping and the location of the enemies, as well as the goods are indicated on a small map in the bottom.

To complete each level, players need to collect a set amount of goods indicated at the top-right part of the screen.

name: Eggo
summary: A desktop pet that can fall in love and have a baby with your friend’s Eggo! Start with a simple egg and raise it into your most special companion, stay with you while you work or study — and who knows, maybe you’ll get a rare mixed-heritage Eggo baby!

name: Eggerland 2
summary: Find a hidden treasure in mazes of EDENERLAND. Clear each stage by answering puzzles which are given one after another. After clearing 100 stages of mazes with all your wisdom, then comes the final stage of glory. Can you find your way to this stage and save your dear LALA?

name: Eggconsole Rune Worth PC-9801
summary: Embark on an epic adventure set in the world of Rune Worth. This game features a unique spell system where casting spells requires time to chant before activation.

name: Eggconsole Schwarzschild PC-9801
summary: Become the young king of the Sankuri Star Nation and unify all the star systems of the galaxy. Enjoy a space opera in this turn-based sci-fi simulation game.

name: Egg Up
summary: You need to get the egg to the top. To get your egg to the top, jump from platform to platform. Some platforms have red bounce pads allowing the egg to jump much higher. Some platforms contain diamonds that the player can collect while bouncing to the top of the level. Simple in concept yet very addictive, this game will ask for your best skills to succeed! Get it up!

name: Egg Hop
summary: Use eggs to hop your way through the temple to make your way to the treasure.

name: Eggscape
summary: You’re a chicken escaping the slaughter line. Find your stolen chicks and free your fellow chickens as you fight through the factory, and survive the hunt from workers and failed lab creations.

name: Ego Hearts
summary: Ego Hearts is a small interactive reflection about death and what do we leave behind it. Take a paper plane and share your warmth to get the February away.

name: Eggconsole Puyo Puyo PC-9801
summary: A classic falling-block puzzle game! Connect four Puyos of the same color to clear them!

name: Egg Fly
summary: EGG · FLY is a super difficult physical platformer jumping game, by moving the mouse position and reasonable mouse click speed, control the jump height and direction, believe that you have enough patience and skill to complete the challenge.

name: Egg King
summary: Egg King is a platformer game with a twist, you're going to go down by jumping and rolling. Go on a journey across the land and reach the lost crown of the king. Visit different landscapes and raise your ability. Become the new king and make the rich!

name: Eggconsole Marchen Veil PC-8801mkIISR
summary:
The tale of a prince transformed into an ugly monster and cast to the ends of the world. Overcoming numerous challenges, he must now return to the princess!
This action RPG was released by System Sacom in 1985.

This game is the first part of the "Märchen Veil" series. The story of the first part is until you meet Neptunus, the god of the sea.

name: Eggconsole Wonderland of Carbuncle MSX2
summary: A peculiar shooting game featuring the exploits of Carbuncle. Fight enemies, collect apples, and battle bosses to clear the stages!

name: Eggconsole Zanac MSX
summary: A representative shooting game for the MSX. Pilot the fighter ZANAC and use 8 types of special weapons to defeat the mechanized army!

name: Eggconsole Crimson II PC-8801mkIISR
summary:
Fifty years have passed since Crimson was defeated by the Hero.
Now, a new darkness looms over the world…

name: Eggconsole Lord Monarch PC-9801
summary: Take the throne as ruler of your nation, govern your lands, and read the ever-changing tides of battle to conquer all enemy nations!

name: Eggconsole Lord Monarch PC-9801
summary: Take the throne as ruler of your nation, govern your lands, and read the ever-changing tides of battle to conquer all enemy nations!

name: Egging On
summary: Face the challenge of being a real, fragile egg. Climb out of the hen house and survive in a shop, a kitchen, and other dangerous areas. Roll, jump, and use the environment to reach new heights. Don't break your eggshell, and do your best not to fall. With determination, you may reach freedom!

name: Egg Summoner
summary: Egg Summoner is a clicker game where you summon and open magical eggs! Crack open each egg to discover unique items that you can trade on the market. Com hang out with us on the discord and let's hatch something BIG!

name: Eggman Hates Furries
summary: Eggman Hates Furries is a Game Maker-based Sonic the Hedgehog fangame made by Oddwarg, billed as "a 2D physics-based platformer which focuses on refined boss battles and stylish presentation". The plot is fairly simple, but not nonexistent. The story opens with Sonic racing Dr. Eggman to one of the Chaos Emeralds. Just as Sonic is about to claim the gem, Eggman overtakes him, violently knocks him aside, and claims the Emerald for himself. Sonic spends some time unconscious, and dreams of Eggman attacking and capturing his best friend, Miles "Tails" Prower. Sonic wakes up at his and Tails' home, and walks outside to find Tails making some adjustments to the Tornado before setting out on a casual flight. Sonic attempts to follow Tails, only to be confronted by Eggman, who promptly knocks Sonic off a nearby cliff. Sonic and Tails are quickly caught up in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse against Eggman and his many contraptions, fighting for their very lives.

name: Eggson
summary: After being captured by EGG CORP for failing to comply with them, it’s now your mission to escape their facility. Run, jump, and fight your way out in this fast-paced 3D platformer heavily inspired by KARLSON

name: Eggtastic
summary: Eggtastic - A retro puzzle game where you paint, mask, and design eggs to match the target. Simple to learn, fun for all ages.

name: Eggtastic
summary: Eggtastic - A retro puzzle game where you paint, mask, and design eggs to match the target. Simple to learn, fun for all ages.

name: Eggular Game
summary: In this game you are an egg and you need to find a ridiculous amount of ham. Explore the strange world, encounter the bizarre inhabitants, dodge pizza, summon hippos and explore everywhere to find all the hams! Be sure to be thorough and get home in time for dinner with the King! You don't want to disappoint him...

name: Eggconsole Hajya No Fuuin PC-8801
summary: A gripping otherworldly RPG! Descendant of the hero Iason, unravel the mystery of the “Seal of the Dark Lord” with allies scattered across the world and restore peace!

name: Eggconsole Super Zenon Gamma 5 PC-8801mkIISR
summary: Join the Earth military G Squadron, "Gamma-5," as a member and destroy the antimatter bomb detonation device located on the Devil's Star to save Earth!

name: Eggs of Steel: Charlie's Eggcellent Adventure
summary: Charlie has really done it this time. While reaching for his beloved donuts, he accidentally spilled coffee on his work station at the MomSteel Steel Factory. Now the machinery has taken on a life of its own! Assume control of Charlie the Egg in your effort to find the reset switch located somewhere within the factory.

name: Eggconsole The Legend of Heroes Saga PC-8801
summary:
Set out on a journey as a brave warrior to defeat the dragon and save Linda, a young girl!
An adventure game set in a world of swords and magic!

name: E-gon Adventures
summary: E-gon Adventures is a game in the style of Pang. Like in Pang the player (E-gon) needs to shoot the bubbles until all the bubbles disappear and the next level will start. He needs to be careful from the bubbles. If a bubble hits the player he will lose one life. There are power-ups that help the player like double shooting, a shot that stays for few a seconds, freezing the bubbles for a few seconds and an extra life. This game is the first in the E-gon Adventures series.

name: Eggconsole The Scheme PC-8801mkIISR
summary: Unleash your Force and take down the Hellstone Cult! A side-scrolling action RPG with captivating BGM.

name: Egglets: The Long 10 Days
summary: A 10-day crisis management simulation. As Eggon’s administrator, you follow absurd orders, manage chaos, and seek truth between news and rumors. Obey commands – or choose humanity? The fate of the Egglets rest in your hands.

name: Egg
summary: Egg is a small adventure game about solving puzzles by picking things up and placing them down. The goal is to carry the egg to the top of the mountain.

name: Eggconsole Mugen no Shinzou PC-8801

Welcome to Egypt Solitaire, the classic solitaire game with a twist of Ancient Egyptian flair!
This game will take you on a journey through a captivating world of hieroglyphs and temples, while you play a classic game of solitaire.

Egypt Solitaire features incredibly realistic graphics and sound effects to give you the most immersive experience possible. The aim of the game is to move all of the cards from the tableau to the foundations. In the tableau, the cards are arranged in seven piles and the top cards of each pile are turned face up. The foundations are located at the top of the playing area and are made up of four piles with increasing amounts of cards.

You can move cards from the tableau to the foundations by either building up or down in sequence. You can also build in-suit sequences by moving the top card of a pile to the top of another pile, if it is of the same suit. If a player is unable to make any more moves, they can draw three new cards from the stock pile. However, once the stock pile is exhausted, the game is over and the player has lost.

Egypt Solitaire also comes with multiple difficulty levels, ranging from easy to expert, which makes it suitable for players.

Enjoy!

The unique feature of this game is the distinctive attack method. The fireballs can not only be launched but also freely controlled and detonated. However, since the fireballs are linked to the movement of the player's character, it may be challenging until you get used to it.

Being caught in the blast of a fireball will also knock down your character, so understanding the stage layout and enemy placements is crucial. Controlling the fireballs becomes a key strategy.

name: Egg
summary:
Egg is a Game & Watch video game released in 1981. The game was similar to the previously released Mickey Mouse game, though due to copyright issues which prevented them from using the brand in some countries, they replaced Mickey Mouse with a wolf, though the gameplay remains essentially the same. The countries where Mickey Mouse was replaced by Egg include some Asian countries and Australia. In the Soviet Union there were the wolf and the hare from Soviet animated TV series Nu, Pogodi!. Egg was never released in Japan. Within the box were LR43 batteries, a caution leaflet, and battery stickers. The game sold an estimated 250,000 units worldwide. The game's model number is EG-26.

Interestingly, Egg was included in the Game Boy Color video game Game & Watch Gallery 3 in 1999.

name: Eggconsole Xanadu PC-8801mkIISR
summary:
A monster title that recorded sales of 400,000 copies in the Japanese PC game market. When talking about the history of RPGs, you can’t leave this one out - it’s a must-play!

A side-view action RPG released by Nihon Falcom in 1985, the player takes on the role of an adventurer to explore a total of 10 stages and ultimately defeat the King Dragon. Stores are placed on the map and monsters roam the streets, but monsters are finite and cease to appear once they are hunted down.

Combat uses a symbol-encounting system. When you come in contact with an enemy, the battle scene switches to the battlefield, where you fight using weapon attacks (body blows) and magic. Treasure chests appear when enemies are defeated, and items and money can be acquired.

In this game, the player character does not have a profession, but has two types of experience and levels: warrior and wizard, and can grow into either a warrior or wizard type depending on which type of character is used to defeat enemies. Weapons, armor, and magic also have experience values, and using the same items can result in increased effectiveness.

With domestic sales of 400,000 units (Japan), this PC game from the 1980s still holds a record that remains unbroken. It's difficult to find another title that truly embodies the term 'epoch-making' as well as this one!

summary: Egg Chef challenges you to cook and deliver eggs for points while avoiding dropping eggs. Play by yourself for a high score or online with friends to see who the best egg chef is. Cook green eggs to earn items for a competitive advantage.

name: Eggcellent VR
summary: Eggcellent VR is a simple arcade game inspired by Mickey Mouse egg catcher on Nintendo Game & Watch. The game is driven by a pure spirit of arcade with every level getting more and more challenging. Despite the inspiration of the game, it has additional gaming modes to keep you entertained.

name: Eggies
summary:
Hatch the all Eggies!
Eggies want to be part of our planet but their eggs need great sense for solicitude and care. Are you good enough to feed, cure and hatch them all? Your reward will be love and fun gained from your virtual pets.
Eggies are ready to play with you various games like Flappy Egg, Pexeso, Puzzle. Visit shop where you can decorate your Eggie or change its appearance. Do you have favorite color? Or would you like to try some ornament or original hat? Everything is possible!

name: Eggy
summary: Eggy is a 2.5D artillery platformer where you aim and shoot an egg through a beautiful seamless environment. Egg-splore the world by rolling, swimming and bouncing in search for Eggy's mom.

name: Egnaro
summary: Egnaro is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Yuzuka.

name: Egypt Picross: Pharaoh's Riddles
summary: Solve the secret of the pharaoh and find pyramids’ treasure in Pharaoh's Riddles! New egyptian riddles await you!

name: Eggsplorer
summary: A game in which you control an egg-shaped player to explore 4 unique levels.

name: Egg War Puzzle
summary: "Egg War Puzzle" is a mixed-mode fighting puzzle action game in which battles unfold in an otherworldly reincarnation.

name: Eggсellence: Eggs Bounce
summary:
Don't just be good - be egg-cellent! Catch the eggs falling from many directions in a chicken coop. How long can you go on without cracking an egg? Challenge your friends and show them who is the real egg savior!
Eggсellence is a 2D family arcade game about farming. Meet Russ Eggsavior, a nice hard-working guy who is doing his best to keep his little chicken farm in order. Help Russ at the farm, and don't drop the eggs!

name: Eggy Space
summary: A light tower defense game with unique planet exploration. Defend against aliens, collect resources, and build a new home. Exquisite graphics and challenges await!

name: E-Genes: Funtball
summary:
E-Genes - Funtball is a game inspired in Worms and NES World Cup.

The game is turn based and you can play VS AI or Co-op with two players sharing the same mouse by turns.

name: Eggconsole Undeadline MSX2
summary: A fantasy-themed action shooting game with a high level of difficulty, but it's a well-crafted title that offers a satisfying and challenging experience.

name: Eggconsole Tritorn PC-8801
summary: Tritorn, a brave warrior, stands up to restore peace to the island of Luwanda. This is an excellent action RPG that became famous in the early days of PC games!

name: Egyptian Ratslap
summary: Enjoy a laid-back session of your new favorite card game that mixes the rules of slap jack and more!

name: Egypt Blocks Puzzle
summary: Go deeper inside the Great Pyramid using your brain to move Stone Blocks out of the way! Watch for Traps,Secret Passages,Pressure Plates,and Hieroglyphs. You can move only what you can reach. Drag and Drop mechanics and more than 60 levels.

name: Egg Hunt
summary: A tile matching puzzle arcade game developed by Invi Image.

name: Eggomania
summary: Eggomania is similar to the game Kaboom. At the top of the screen is a bird which is throwing eggs at you! You need to catch them in your hat before they hit the bottom of the screen. If you miss any eggs, they will break and yolk starts collecting at the bottom of the screen. Miss too many, and the game will be over. At the end of each round you will be given an opportunity to earn bonus points; you now get to throw all of the eggs you caught back at the bird! As the levels progress, the games speed will increase. There are two difficulty levels available, in the easier variation you get a larger hat to catch the eggs with.

name: Eggs 2142
summary: The Galactic Eggpire are taking over the galaxy. Join The Scrambled Alliance and roll, launch and scramble some eggs!

name: EG Chess
summary: A complete 3D chess experience in HD. Swipe rotate and pinch to zoom to adjust the board to any viewing angle. Watch as your Queen moves in real time to its destination and obliterates the opposing piece. Play online with Game Center, Bluetooth or locally against your friends, family and other chess enthusiasts.

name: Eggconsole Popful Mail PC-8801MkIISR
summary: Set in a world of swords and magic, the comical adventures of a bounty hunter begin. The definitive slapstick action RPG adventure is here!

name: Eggconsole Thexder PC-8801mkIISR
summary:
When discussing retro robot-themed games, one masterpiece that always comes to mind is 'THEXDER'. This action-shooting game was released in 1985.

The player takes control of the hyper dual-armor "THEXDER," which can transform into both robot and fighter forms, and throws himself into the battle to destroy the magnetic field generator of the asteroid Nediam. The game is played in side-view and consists of 16 stages (plus 16 back stages).

In the battle against the enemy, you can use either the robot form, which has a tracking laser but inferior mobility, or the fighter form, which can only attack in the direction you are going but has superior mobility, depending on the situation. Barriers are also available, but if they are used too often, they will run out of energy, so they should be used only when the situation calls for it! You should use them only when you need them.

The game is based on the life system with no save function, so you only have one shot each time you play! The difficulty level of the game is high, so if you are good at it, please give it a try.

This is a masterpiece that has been carefully crafted with a world view, excellent mecha design, and smooth animation during transformation, not to mention the addictive nature that makes you want to play it over and over again despite its difficulty.

name: Egyptian Settlement Gold
summary:
Colonize unused lands and protect the whole empire from a devastating famine!
An exciting and entertaining mixture of time-management and strategy along with many teeming characters is waiting for you.

name: Egyptgington
summary: Medium-sized Egyptian pyramid level, originally started for the Retro Map Jam 6 community event.

name: Eggcelerate! to the North Pole
summary: Race through winter with slippery physics attempting to carry an egg on top of your vehicle! Time-trial your way to the top of the leaderboards, collect 100 snowmen and snowwomen hidden around the world, and do your best not to break an egg!

name: Egression
summary: You’re here for puzzles, and that’s what you’ll get. Step into a deluxe virtual escape room establishment. Challenge your mind with handcrafted puzzles designed exclusively for VR. Explore immersive environments and piece together the clues to escape!

name: EggFight
summary: Welcome to EggFight! This is a game of fighting other eggs and accomplishing your mission first. Use various weapons to crash and disturb the other eggs!

name: Eggconsole Templo Del Sol: Asteka II PC-8801
summary: Embark on an adventure set in the ancient ruins of Chichen Itza, where you'll explore the Temple of the Sun and search for the Solar Key.

name: Egg Runner
summary: Help The Egg to collect coins and power ups in this endless runner. Unlock new characters and defeat enemies. Egg Runner is a simple yet addictive game that will bring you hours of fun.

name: EggK47
summary:
EggK47 is a hardcore 3D platformer third person/chicken single player PC shooter game created by one man indie game studio Lorag Games
There's something going on at Terror Taste Farms. The mean old greedy farmers have killed all the chickens...except one...and now hes armed with his EGG-K-47 Fight off the farmers and collect all the golden eggs to continue your journey

name: Egggg
summary: This is a simple game where all you need to do is control an egg to jump and climb high mountains to return to its nest. Trust me, most people will complete this challenge in a relaxed and pleasant mood.

name: Ego Death
summary: An action, puzzle platformer about Jack who attempts suicide and fails, and his inner demons that want him to see it through.

name: Egg Run
summary: Collect the twig and get to the base of the ladder in as few moves as possible.

name: Egg
summary: A Light Blue Yoshi must eat cookies as they pop out of an oven (a concept similar to Yoshi's Cookie), but he has to avoid the Bob-ombs.

name: Egress Protocol
summary:
Egress Protocol is a dark party indie game in which the player must ascend an infinite tower with progressingly difficult enemies.

~Part of the Vitalisis Systems Incorporated lore line~

name: Egg Fried Rice
summary:
It's the middle of the night. You need to rest but your stomach is growling and
it's all you can think about. You're never going to fall asleep like this, you can't
fight it. Is there any food in the house? Something quick? Something easy?
Perhaps you will have to visit the local takeaway and order some EGG FRIED RICE...

name: Eggconsole Relics PC-8801
summary:
This is an action-adventure game released by Bothtec in 1986. The main character is drifting as a spirit in the ruins that suddenly appear from under the sea. There is no explanation as to why he has become a spirit or what he has to do, but by exploring the ruins, the situation becomes dimly apparent.

One of the highlights of this game is the spirit ride system, in which the player possesses a defeated opponent. The attack methods and durability vary depending on the possessed body, so the key to the strategy is which creature you possess as you continue your search. In addition, the items that can be obtained change depending on the player's actions, and the storyline and ending change, so it is up to the player to decide how to proceed with the exploration of the ruins. The ability to experiment with this and that is a unique aspect of this game.

The cinematic elements of the game, such as the rich sci-fi character designs, the profound movements of the humanoid characters, and the effective sound of the waves, will add to the excitement of the game. The opening and ending music was composed by Crystal King, which was a big hit at the time.

name: E-Girl Next Door
summary: You've just moved in next door to a beautiful girl who seems to have it all together. Little do you know, she's just getting started in the world of online adult content creation. Help her out on her journey and see what this exciting adventure has to offer.

name: Eggconsole Aqua Polis SOS MSX
summary: A shooting game depicting a rescue drama set in an underwater city. Avoid obstacles and missile interference as you save the people of the underwater city!

name: Egg Hunt
summary: Climb the mountain, collect the eggs, and avoid Kangaroo Guards so you can make it to the top and save Mrs. Chicken.

name: Egyptian Senet
summary: Egyptian Senet is a board game from predynastic and ancient Egypt that combines luck, strategy and magic. Don't miss the opportunity to play the world's oldest Board Game.

name: Egyptian Myth
summary: An excellent large Egyptian temple themed map that will keep you in the action almost the whole time.

name: Egg Surprise
summary: A fun clicker with economic simulation in the penguin kingdom. Obtain rare collections, venture into dangerous dungeons, and build your own civilization!

name: Egg Fighters
summary: Earn your wings as a World War I & II flying Ace in Egg Fighters! Immerse yourself in WWII combat and the dawn of aerial warfare as you pilot revolutionary lovely flying machines. Take-off solo in survival mode, or take to the skies online with up to 4 players in real-time multiplayer.

name: Egypt Collection
summary: Collection released in Germany containing all 3 games of the Egypt-trilogy on a single DVD.

name: Eggconsole Arguice No Tsubasa PC-8801mkIISR
summary: The King of Arguice fell to the attack of the demonic creatures, leaving the world in ruins. The prince, having somehow survived, sets off on an adventure.

name: Egawa Suguru no Super League CD
summary: Egawa Suguru no Super League CD is a baseball game released as part of the Super League and a sequel to Pro Yakyuu Super League CD.

name: Eggstraction
summary: Eggstraction is a multiplayer (4vs1) heist game where four feathered friends must face off against an egg-napping farmer. With chaos around every corner, can the chickens rescue their stolen eggs, or will they end up back in their cage?

name: Eggconsole Sorcerian PC-8801mkIISR
summary:
Dragon Slayer, the fifth installment in the Dragon Slayer series, continues to enjoy enduring popularity.
Embark on an adventure into a world of swords, magic!

name: Egg vs. Chicken
summary: The player takes on the role of heroic eggs traveling through time to defeat the evil chickens who want to stamp out their very existence.

name: Egg Defense
summary: 'Egg Defense' is a strategy game where players deploy units to defend against enemy eggs from portals. Units have unique skills. Every 5 stages, players upgrade character skills using selected cards. The game blends casual strategy with enjoyable action for a delightful gaming experience.

name: Egg Returns Home
summary: Egg Returns Home is a simple platformer about an egg, which is trying to find his way back home. At every level egg needs to get to the teleport.
